---
id: explicit
title: Explicit progression
---
## Complete Registration
- Jon subscribes to newsletter with email jon@email.com , listed as UID-A
- Jon gets email with link to complete the registration
- Jon clicks on "complete the registration"
- Jon is redirected to a page with complete registration screen
- Jon update his username and password
- Jon now is a registered user, still UID-A
 

[![](https://mermaid.)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/edit/##)
